```{r}
sites <- read_csv(here::here ("data","sfbay_rockweed_site_names_locations.csv"), col_names = TRUE)
rtcsites <- sites[ which(sites$group=='rtc'), ]
```


```{r}
# Create a map with all of the sites plotted.
options(ggrepel.max.overlaps = Inf)
all <-
  ggmap(
    get_map(
      location = c(lon = -122.43448569306662, lat = 37.88189695628280),
      source = "google",
      zoom = 11,
      scale = 2 ,
      size = c(640, 640),
      format = "png8",
      maptype = 'satellite',
      color = 'color'
    )
  )
all2 <- all + geom_point(aes(x = long, y = lat, color = site_name),
                 data = sites,
                 size = 3,
                 shape = 21,
                 stroke = 1) +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")+
  guides(col = guide_legend(ncol = 3))

all3 <- all + geom_point(aes(x = long, y = lat, color = site_type),
                 data = sites,
                 size = 3,
                 shape = 21,
                 stroke = 1) +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")+
  guides(col = guide_legend(ncol = 3))
  
  
  # geom_label_repel(
  #   aes(x = long, y = lat, label = bay_perim_order),
  #   data = sites,
  #   family = 'Arial',
  #   size = 2,
  #   box.padding = 0.1,
  #   point.padding = 0.5,
  #   segment.color = 'grey50'
  # )


```

```{r}
# Create a map zoomed in for Tiburon sites .

options(ggrepel.max.overlaps = Inf)
rtc <-
  ggmap(
    get_map(
      location = c(lon = -122.47121817785745, lat = 37.91352394528543),
      source = "google",
      zoom = 13,
      scale = 2 ,
      size = c(640, 640),
      format = "png8",
      maptype = 'satellite',
      color = 'color'
    )
  )

rtc2 <- rtc + geom_point(aes(x = long, y = lat, color = site_type),
                 data = rtcsites,
                 size = 3,
                 shape = 21,
                 stroke = 1) +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")+
  guides(col = guide_legend(ncol = 3))+
  geom_label_repel(
    aes(x = long, y = lat, label = site_name),
    data = rtcsites,
    size = 2,
    box.padding = 0.2,
    point.padding = 0.3,
    segment.color = 'black'
  )
```
